title: The present is female. Check out Femina's 60th anniversary cover
text:
With great power comes great responsibility! This movie dialogue may be nothing more than social media buzzword for many; for Femina, which has turned super 60 this year, it stands true to all its form. Our cover for the 60th anniversary special is all about a woman's strength and determination, beauty and grace, and hard work and ambition. Our cover stars embody these qualities. We’re proud to present Bollywood’s leading lady Deepika Padukone, ace shuttler and world badminton champ PV Sindhu, and bio-tech biz pioneer Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw on our iconic cover.





Being as young as Doordarshan, which also kicked off in the year 1959, we are gratified to have been part of a social, cultural, technological and societal evolution, while being a part of the lives of Indian women from every era. Beaming with our 60-year-old legacy, we aspire to look at the next 60, the future and all that it holds.



Read stories on some trailblazers, know more about sustainable fashion, and find out about the evolution of beauty in the past 60 years in this power-packed issue. The issue hits the stands on October 10. Go, grab your copy.
description: Deepika Padukone, PV Sindhu and Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw power Femina's 60th anniversary cover   Deepika Padukone, PV Sindhu and Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw power Femina's 6
